023package org.opt4j.optimizers.mopso;
024
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.HashMap;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.Map.Entry;
030import java.util.Random;
031
032import org.opt4j.core.Genotype;
033import org.opt4j.core.Individual;
034import org.opt4j.core.IndividualFactory;
035import org.opt4j.core.Objectives;
036import org.opt4j.core.common.archive.Crowding;
037import org.opt4j.core.common.archive.CrowdingArchive;
038import org.opt4j.core.common.random.Rand;
039import org.opt4j.core.genotype.DoubleGenotype;
040import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.Archive;
041import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IncompatibilityException;
042import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IndividualCompleter;
043import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer;
044import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.Population;
045import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.TerminationException;
046import org.opt4j.core.start.Constant;
047import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Add;
048import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.AlgebraDouble;
049import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Index;
050import org.opt4j.operators.algebra.Term;
051import org.opt4j.operators.mutate.MutationRate;
052import org.opt4j.operators.normalize.NormalizeDouble;
053
054import com.google.inject.Inject;
055
056/**
057 * The {@link MOPSO} is an implementation of a multi-objective particle swarm
058 * optimizer, see "Improving PSO-based Multi-Objective Optimization using
059 * Crowding, Mutation and e-Dominance, M. Reyes Sierra and C. A. Coello Coello,
060 * In Proceedings of Evolutionary Multi-Criterion Optimization, 2005". This
061 * implementation is based on the OMOPSO. Thus, this MOPSO is restricted to
062 * problems that are based on the {@link DoubleGenotype}.
063 * 
064 * @author lukasiewycz
065 * 
066 */
067public class MOPSO implements IterativeOptimizer {
068
069        protected final int size;
070
071        protected final Archive leaders;
072
073        protected final ParticleFactory particleFactory;
074
075        protected final AlgebraDouble algebra;
076
077        protected final Random random;
078
079        protected final VelocityTerm velocityTerm;
080
081        protected final Term positionTerm;
082
083        protected final MutateDoubleUniform uniform;
084
085        protected final MutateDoubleUniform nonUniform;
086
087        protected final MutationRate mutationRate;
088
089        private final Population population;
090
091        private final IndividualCompleter completer;
092
093        /**
094         * Constructs a {@link MOPSO}.
095         * 
096         * @param population
097         *            the population
098         * @param individualFactory
099         *            the individual (particle) factory
100         * @param completer
101         *            the completer
102         * @param random
103         *            the random number generator
104         * @param uniform
105         *            the uniform mutation
106         * @param nonUniform
107         *            the non-uniform mutation
108         * @param mutationRate
109         *            the mutation rate
110         * @param size
111         *            the number of particles
112         * @param archiveSize
113         *            the size of the archive for the global leaders
114         */
115        @Inject
116        public MOPSO(Population population, IndividualFactory individualFactory, IndividualCompleter completer, Rand random,
117                        MutateDoubleUniform uniform, MutateDoubleNonUniform nonUniform, MutationRate mutationRate,
118                        @Constant(value = "size", namespace = MOPSO.class) int size,
119                        @Constant(value = "archiveSize", namespace = MOPSO.class) int archiveSize) {
120                this.particleFactory = (ParticleFactory) individualFactory;
121                this.leaders = new CrowdingArchive(archiveSize);
122                this.random = random;
123                this.uniform = uniform;
124                this.nonUniform = nonUniform;
125                this.mutationRate = mutationRate;
126                this.population = population;
127                this.completer = completer;
128
129                this.size = size;
130
131                this.algebra = new AlgebraDouble(new NormalizeDouble() {
132                        @Override
133                        public void normalize(DoubleGenotype genotype) {
134                                // do nothing
135                        }
136                });
137
138                Index x = new Index(0);
139                Index v = new Index(1);
140                positionTerm = new Add(x, v);
141                velocityTerm = new VelocityTerm(random);
142        }
143
144        /*
145         * (non-Javadoc)
146         * 
147         * @see org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer#initialize()
148         */
149        @Override
150        public void initialize() {
151                // nothing to be done
152        }
153
154        /*
155         * (non-Javadoc)
156         * 
157         * @see org.opt4j.core.optimizer.IterativeOptimizer#next()
158         */
159        @Override
160        public void next() throws TerminationException {
161                if (population.isEmpty()) {
162                        // the first iteration
163                        int id = 0;
164                        while (population.size() < size) {
165                                Particle particle = particleFactory.create();
166                                particle.setId(id++);
167                                Genotype genotype = particle.getGenotype();
168                                if (!(genotype instanceof DoubleGenotype)) {
169                                        throw new IncompatibilityException("MOPSO is restricted to " + DoubleGenotype.class
170                                                        + ", current Genotype is: " + genotype.getClass());
171                                }
172                                population.add(particle);
173                        }
174                } else {
175                        // all iterations > 1
176                        // determine the leaders
177                        updateLeaders(leaders, population);
178
179                        // determine one leader for each particle
180                        Map<Particle, Particle> lead = getLeaders(leaders, population);
181                        // determine the next position of each particle
182                        Map<Particle, Particle> next = move(population, lead);
183
184                        population.addAll(next.values());
185                        completer.complete(population);
186
187                        // update the personal best of each particle
188                        updatePersonalBest(next);
189
190                        // remove the old positions
191                        population.removeAll(next.keySet());
192                }
193        }
194
195        /**
196         * Determine the new positions for the {@link Particle}s in the
197         * {@link Population}.
198         * 
199         * @param population
200         *            the population
201         * @param leaders
202         *            the map for the global leaders
203         * @return the map of the old to the new particle
204         */
205        protected Map<Particle, Particle> move(Population population, Map<Particle, Particle> leaders) {
206                Map<Particle, Particle> map = new HashMap<>();
207
208                for (Individual individual : population) {
209
210                        Particle particle = (Particle) individual;
211
212                        DoubleGenotype position = (DoubleGenotype) particle.getGenotype();
213                        DoubleGenotype velocity = (DoubleGenotype) particle.getVelocity();
214                        DoubleGenotype best = (DoubleGenotype) particle.getBest();
215                        int id = particle.getId();
216
217                        DoubleGenotype leader = (DoubleGenotype) leaders.get(particle).getGenotype();
218
219                        velocityTerm.randomize();
220
221                        DoubleGenotype nextVelocity = algebra.algebra(velocityTerm, position, velocity, best, leader);
222
223                        DoubleGenotype nextPosition = algebra.algebra(positionTerm, position, nextVelocity);
224
225                        for (int k = 0; k < nextPosition.size(); k++) {
226                                double value = nextPosition.get(k);
227                                double lb = nextPosition.getLowerBound(k);
228                                double ub = nextPosition.getUpperBound(k);
229                                if (value < lb) {
230                                        nextPosition.set(k, lb);
231                                        nextVelocity.set(k, -nextVelocity.get(k));
232                                } else if (value > ub) {
233                                        nextPosition.set(k, ub);
234                                        nextVelocity.set(k, -nextVelocity.get(k));
235                                }
236                        }
237
238                        if (id % 3 == 0) {
239                                uniform.mutate(nextPosition, mutationRate.get());
240                        } else if (id % 3 == 1) {
241                                nonUniform.mutate(nextPosition, mutationRate.get());
242                        } // else do nothing
243
244                        Particle p = particleFactory.create(id, nextPosition, nextVelocity);
245
246                        map.put(particle, p);
247                }
248
249                return map;
250        }
251
252        /**
253         * Update the global leaders {@link Archive}.
254         * 
255         * @param leaders
256         *            the archive
257         * @param population
258         *            the population
259         */
260        protected void updateLeaders(Archive leaders, Population population) {
261                leaders.update(population);
262        }
263
264        /**
265         * Update the personal best of each {@link Particle}.
266         * 
267         * @param next
268         *            the old and new positions
269         */
270        protected void updatePersonalBest(Map<Particle, Particle> next) {
271                for (Entry<Particle, Particle> entry : next.entrySet()) {
272
273                        Particle old = entry.getKey();
274                        Particle current = entry.getValue();
275
276                        if (dominates(old, current)) {
277                                current.setBest(old.getBest(), old.getBestObjectives());
278                        } else {
279                                current.setBest(current.getGenotype(), current.getObjectives());
280                        }
281                }
282        }
283
284        /**
285         * Returns {@code true} if the old particle position dominates the new one.
286         * 
287         * @param old
288         *            the old particle
289         * @param current
290         *            the new particle
291         * @return {@code true} if the old particle position dominates the new one
292         */
293        protected boolean dominates(Particle old, Particle current) {
294                if (old.getBest() == null) {
295                        return false;
296                }
297
298                Objectives oldObjectives = old.getBestObjectives();
299                Objectives currentObjectives = current.getObjectives();
300                return oldObjectives.dominates(currentObjectives);
301        }
302
303        /**
304         * Assigns each {@link Particle} a leader.
305         * 
306         * @param leaders
307         *            the archive of available leader
308         * @param population
309         *            the population
310         * @return the map of each particle to its leader
311         */
312        protected Map<Particle, Particle> getLeaders(Archive leaders, Population population) {
313                Map<Particle, Particle> map = new HashMap<>();
314
315                Crowding crowding = new Crowding();
316                Map<Individual, Double> values = crowding.getDensityValues(leaders);
317
318                List<Individual> l = new ArrayList<>(leaders);
319                List<Individual> best = new ArrayList<>();
320
321                for (int i = 0; i < population.size(); i++) {
322                        Individual i1 = l.get(random.nextInt(l.size()));
323                        Individual i2 = l.get(random.nextInt(l.size()));
324
325                        if (values.get(i1) >= values.get(i2)) {
326                                best.add(i1);
327                        } else {
328                                best.add(i2);
329                        }
330                }
331
332                int i = 0;
333
334                for (Individual individual : population) {
335                        Particle particle = (Particle) individual;
336                        Particle leader = (Particle) best.get(i++);
337                        map.put(particle, leader);
338                }
339
340                return map;
341        }
342
343}
